ticket_title: Complaint Regarding Poor Communication and Lack of Staff Training – Flight AL1013
ticket_summary: Customer expresses dissatisfaction with communication and staff training on Flight AL1013.
email_subject: Complaint Regarding Poor Communication and Lack of Staff Training – Flight AL1013
email_body:
Dear Customer Service,

I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the communication regarding my recent flight, AL1013. There were significant delays and it seemed that the staff were not adequately trained to handle the situation. I believe this needs immediate attention to improve customer experience in the future.

Best,
Arvind Vivekanandan
